items.item: This amazing device beeps when it detects lost valuables next to you. Don't ask how! Just think how easy it is to make a profit in a school full of careless rich students.
A little tool capable of opening some locks. It's quite frail, so it usually brakes after a single use.
While having the Perception band in your possession, EVERY interactive element that can only be noticed while crouching will periodically glint while you explore an environment
A run of the mill smartphone
